s1: It's black. As you try to move you realize you have no physical form. What do you do?
s2:
--------------------------------
As you begin to take shape, the earth around you gets pushed aside.

After a few seconds, you pop out of the ground, your physical shape complete.

You are newly born gem, made in the Earth kindergarten.

Your physical shape feels good, and as you stretch, you feel your gem. Where is it located?
s3.1:
huh? Good choice.

As you get used to your form, another gem walks up to you.

The stranger looks at you, and then speaks. 'I am Peridot Facet-4X13L Cut-6BW, and I am here to pick you up and escort you to your destination.'

The 'Peridot', as she calls herself, does not smile, but maintains a very serious posture and air about her.

What do you do in response?
s4:
--------------------------------
Without a single word, you turn and run. The Peridot looks surprised as you do so, but then remains completely calm.

You hear her say something, probably into a communicator of some kind. 'The new
s4.1:
is escaping. Send backup, I am in persuit.'

All of a sudden, a huge gem lands in front of you, probably a quartz. She smashes her fist down on your head and you instantly black out.
